Verdo is a Premium and High-Quality Grocery Delivery Mobile App UI Kit with 132 Screens which is highly customizable. Designs are available in Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, and Invision. In addition, the design is also equipped with a version of Light & Dark Mode.


Verdo is designed in a trendy and modern way, with all layers well organized. Verdo is equipped with a large design system with 500+ components.


In addition, the application design especially figma has been designed with fully auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to delete or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.
